nowPlayingCard.description: Shows a notification with the name of the currently playing song.
nowPlayingCard.name: Show notification

randomizeWhenExiting.description: Randomize the song when you exit a level (for example when exiting the editor)
randomizeWhenExiting.name: Randomize on level exit

notificationTime.description: Modify the time that the notification is on screen
notificationTime.name: Notification time
